content: join with slip_stitch 63 half_double_crochet round 8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet 2hdc in next half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet round 9-21 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet swtitch to white yarn with slip_stitch round 22 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet switch to brown yarn with slip_stitch round 23 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch 72 half_double_crochet fasten_off weave in ends earflap count 6 stitches to the left from the seam join yarn with slip_stitch with outside of hat facing you row 1 chain 2 half_double_crochet in next 14 14 half_double_crochet row 2 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 10 hdc2tog 12 half_double_crochet row 3 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 8 hdc2tog 10 half_double_crochet row 4 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 6 hdc2tog 8 half_double_crochet row 5 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 4 hdc2tog 6 half_double_crochet row 6 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog half_double_crochet in next 2 hdc2tog 4 half_double_crochet row 7 chain 2 and turn hdc2tog twice 2 half_double_crochet fasten_off for the other side count 20 stitches to the right from the seam and repeat earflap pattern fasten_off and weave in ends -7- elizabeth roggasch © 2012 attachments ears make 2 using brown yarn round 1 chain 3 in first chain 8 half_double_crochet or make a magic loop chain 2 6 half_double_crochet in ring do not join with slip_stitch making a half circle 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 12 half_double_crochet round 3 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2hdc in next half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next 3 half_double_crochet 2hdc in next half_double_crochet 20 half_double_crochet fasten_off leave long tail to sew onto beanie using white yarn round 1 chain 3 in first chain 8 half_double_crochet or make a magic loop chain 2 6 half_double_crochet in ring do not join with slip_stitch making a half circle 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 12 half_double_crochet round 3 chain 2 and turn half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2hdc in next half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet fasten_off leave long tail to sew onto beanie -8- elizabeth roggasch © 2012 ~ thank you ~ thank you so much for purchasing this pattern correction & questions if you find any errors inconsistencies or have questions about this pattern please email me at thelittlebucketboutique@gmail com i want you to have as much fun crocheting this pattern as i had creating it so please contact me if something s not right or is a bit confusing feedback others will want to know what you think your positive feedback will help others so leave a little love and share a couple insights here are a few places you can do just that facebook like me on facebook https //www facebook
